description:
Did you know that ALFONS loves spring? He does!

This collection is diffrent. 
ItÂ´s not part of the regular series. 

Every green collection ALFONS costs only 1Mi. But the royalty level is at 60%. This means that the artist gets 60% of the price if somebedy (re)-sells his Alfons. Be aware about this when buying.

The green collection. This is art. This is satire.

This is one of the first "Art Satire" - Projects in the Cryptospace.

This "Alfons Trekner"-Collection again shows the development from the Basic Alfons Trekner without many effects to the final picture of this collection which has lots of artefacts and effects.

7 Steps - 7 beautiful unique pictures.

Check out the details of the final version!

The way of creation is the artists secret.

This is the green collection of our lovely Alfons Trekner. Others will follow. Maybe. Or not?! Every collection could be the final one!

One Alfons / person only.
name: Alfons Trekner - The Green Collection
